item.title: Follow live: Mayfield hits Johnson for TD as Bucs get on the board

item.description: Azzi Fudd is the new projected No. 1 pick after Dallas won the draft lottery for the second consecutive year.

item.title: Dak moves by Romo, sets Cowboys record in win
item.description: Dak Prescott moved past Tony Romo to become the Cowboys' passing yards leader Sunday.
